Literature.Title: A Series of Dipeptide Derivatives Containing (S)-5-Oxo-pyrrolidine-2-carboxylic acid Conjugates: Design, Solid-Phase Peptide Synthesis, in vitro Biological Evaluation, and Molecular Docking Studies
Literature.Author: Tivari SR, Kokate SV, Gayke MS, Ahmad I, Patel H, Kumar SG, Jadeja YS

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli MTCC 443(MIC=75µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa MTCC 1688(MIC=75µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus MTCC 96(MIC=125µg/ml),Streptococcus pyogenes MTCC 442(MIC=125µg/ml),Candida albicans MTCC 227(MIC=75µg/ml),Aspergillus niger MTCC 282(MIC=200µg/ml)
